title: Account Management - Conduct QBR
description: An account manager (vCIO) conducts a Quarterly Business Review with a client to discuss past performance and future IT strategy.

tasks.description: Prepare the QBR presentation deck, including performance metrics, project updates, and strategic recommendations.
tasks.expected_outcome: A comprehensive QBR deck is created.

tasks.description: Lead the QBR meeting with the client, presenting the information and facilitating a discussion about their business goals.
tasks.expected_outcome: A successful strategic discussion takes place with the client.

tasks.description: Based on the discussion, create a quote for a new project to address a business need identified during the meeting (e.g., improving cybersecurity posture).
tasks.expected_outcome: The QBR leads to a new sales opportunity.
